Question:
In each of the following questions, five words have been given out of which four are alike in some manner, while the fifth one is different. Choose the word which is different from the rest.

Choose the word which is different from the rest.

A. Pound
B. Yen
C. Ounce
D. Franc
E. Dollar
Solution: All except Ounce are names of currencies, while ounce is a unit of weight.

Question:
In each of the following questions, five words have been given out of which four are alike in some manner, while the fifth one is different. Choose the word which is different from the rest.

Choose the word which is different from the rest.

A. Brick
B. Heart
C. Bridge
D. Spade
E. Club
Solution: All except Brick are suits of cards.

Question:
In each of the following questions, five words have been given out of which four are alike in some manner, while the fifth one is different. Choose the word which is different from the rest.

Choose the word which is different from the rest.

A. Tomato
B. Cucumber
C. Brinjal
D. Carrot
E. Gourd
Solution: Carrot is the only vegetable which grows underground.

In each of the following questions, five words have been given out of which four are alike in some manner, while the fifth one is different. Choose the word which is different from the rest.
